page.title: 03FALLING SCHOOL ROLLS
page.content:
The drop in the birth rate has had a considerable efect on schools in this area.Falling rolls have cut the size of these schools drastically.Many schools have had to lose teachers as class sizes have fallen.Most of the primary schools now support mixed age classes.For example:- {Standard 1 and 2 {Standard 3 and 4
The drop in the number of pupils has also affected sport.In a traditionally strong rugby union area,most primary schools find it impossible to field sides.However there are still active sporting traditions within the area. There is a 5 a side football league,an X1 a side cup,a netball tournament for the girls,together with cricket and rounders during the summer
